      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(IncrementalEvaluationMetric<TK,FV> o)
        Description copied from interface: State
        Compare to object o first based on the relative score assigned to this object and object o, and then, on equality of score, compares o and the current object based on object identity. The latter ensures that o1.compareTo(o2) is never zero unless o1 == o2.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface State<IncrementalEvaluationMetric<TK,FV>>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<IncrementalEvaluationMetric<TK,FV>>
